p: AgNP was synthesized following the citrate reduction method [ 35]. Tannic acid (42 mg, 0.025 mmol) and sodium citrate (150 mg, 0.5 mmol) were dissolved in 100 mL of deionized water, and the solution was heated to 95 °C with vigorous stirring. Then 1 mL of silver (I) nitrate solution (25 mM) was quickly injected and reacted for 1 h at 95 °C.
